name: Robotanic Mayhem
description:
Hello human … I need your help … We must care for these fields … Don’t let them die … And make … me … rich …

We can use my water can or my shots to irrigate the plants but beware them, they can convert into zombies if you don't water them on time!

CONTROLS

- Movement: W A S D
- Shoot: Left Click
- Irrigate: Right Click (Continuous)
- Harvest: E
- Dash: Space bar
- Pause: Escape | P

PLANTS

1. The plants spawn automatically2. You need to irrigate or shoot the plants to increase their water levels (use the recharger if you are out of water!) 
3. To earn money use your harvest skill (only when it is possible)  MONEY!! MONEY!!4. If the plant is not irrigated on time, it will become a zombie (tomato or corn, always evil)

THIRD PARTY ASSETS

Sound Effects - FreeSound

Music - Freemusicarchive - Jason Shaw

Every asset from this game, except those aftermentioned, was created from scratch by the team.
